bug.author: Dr-AyanDebnath
bug.summary: Decoder command specified incorrectly in Beam search decoding tutorial
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
Kindly check <denchmark-link:https://github.com/facebookresearch/wav2letter/wiki/Beam-Search-Decoder>https://github.com/facebookresearch/wav2letter/wiki/Beam-Search-Decoder</denchmark-link> for the decoding command, it is mentioned as wav2letter/build/Decode --am path/to/train/am.bin --test path/to/test/list/file \ --maxload 10 --nthread_decoder 2 \ I believe the command should be wav2letter/build/Decoder i.e. Decoder in place of Decode If I am wrong, kindly rectify me.

comments.comment: Thanks for pointing, I have fixed it.
